title: The Ponder Heart
description: Edna's Uncle Daniel Ponder is quite a character in the town of Clay, Mississippi: he dresses fit to kill and is as good as gold. But he's rich as Croesus, and a great deal too generous. Needing someone to give things to, he marries 17-year-old Bonnie Dee from a poor backwoods family...
author: Eudora Welty
